description:
The Juiced Systems 4 in 1 Connection kit is a special multi-functional card reader for Samsung Galaxy Tablets. It allows your Galaxy Tablet to easily manage, transfer, copy, delete, view, your files.

The USB input is perfect for utilizing thumb drives/external hard drives, digital cameras and USB keyboards.

SD memory & Micro SD inputs are convenient for your memory card reading/writing via your Galaxy Tablet


Juiced Systems 4 in 1 Connection kit allows you to charge/sync your tablet via Micro USB input. The adapter even allows you to charge your tablet via  your laptop usb input (1000- 1300mAH MAX) If the micro usb cable is plugged into your stock Samsung USB wall adapter you will receive a full current charge via your micro usb cable.

Your 4 in 1 connection kit will be your Galaxy Tablets number one accessory!
title: Juiced Systems 4-in-1 Connection Kit for Samsung Galaxy Tablets
